products.name: Premium Dry Dog Food - Adult Formula
products.description: High-quality nutrition for adult dogs with real chicken as the first ingredient. Supports healthy digestion and shiny coat.

products.name: Interactive Puzzle Toy
products.description: Mental stimulation toy that challenges your dog while rewarding with treats. Reduces boredom and anxiety.

products.name: Professional Grooming Kit
products.description: Complete grooming set with brush, nail clippers, shampoo, and towel. Everything you need for professional grooming at home.

products.name: Orthopedic Pet Bed - Large
products.description: Memory foam bed provides joint support and comfort. Removable, washable cover with non-slip bottom.

products.name: Omega-3 Fish Oil Supplements
products.description: Pure fish oil capsules for healthy skin, shiny coat, and joint support. Vet-recommended formula.

products.name: Gourmet Cat Food - Salmon Recipe
products.description: Premium wet cat food made with real salmon. Rich in protein and omega fatty acids for optimal feline health.

products.name: Feather Wand Cat Toy
products.description: Interactive feather toy that encourages natural hunting instincts. Promotes exercise and mental stimulation.

products.name: Stainless Steel Food Bowls Set
products.description: Non-slip, dishwasher-safe bowls perfect for food and water. Includes two bowls with rubber base.

products.name: Waterproof Dog Jacket
products.description: Keeps your dog warm and dry during walks. Reflective strips for night visibility. Available in multiple sizes.

products.name: Dental Health Chew Treats
products.description: Vet-approved dental chews that reduce tartar buildup and freshen breath. Made with natural ingredients.

products.name: Automatic Pet Feeder
products.description: Programmable feeder with portion control. Ideal for maintaining feeding schedules when you're away.

products.name: Cat Scratching Post Tower
products.description: Multi-level scratching post with hanging toys and cozy hiding spots. Protects furniture while entertaining cats.
